MK1.Name: Vehicle Speed Upgrade MK1
MK1.Description: Increases SeaMoth and PRAWN SUIT movement speed.

MK2.Name: Vehicle Speed Upgrade MK2
MK2.Description: Increases SeaMoth and PRAWN SUIT movement speed more than MK1.

MK2.Name: Cyclops Speed Enhancement Module MK2
MK2.Description: Increases Cyclops movement speed more than MK1.
